alert.note: Alert for Eastern Culberson County; Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains; Van Horn and Highway 54 Corridor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 10:39PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL CULBERSON COUNTY THROUGH 1115 PM CDT... At 1039 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 22 miles southeast of Pine Springs, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Culberson County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Culberson County; Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains; Van Horn and Highway 54 Corridor
